subject: Automobile Racing
Stadiums and Arenas
Restoration and Renovation
lead_paragraph: Daytona International Speedway, stock car racing’s spiritual home, has announced a $400 million renovation plan that will reduce seating by 46,000 while modernizing the 54-year-old track.
snippet: Daytona International Speedway, stock car racing’s spiritual home, has announced a $400 million renovation plan that will reduce seating by 46,000 while modernizing the 54-year-old track.
